original_text: And he brought the ark into the tabernacle and set up the veil of the screen, and screened the ark of the testimony, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 또 그 궤를 성막에 들여놓고 가리개 휘장을 늘어뜨려 그 증거궤를 가리니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: And he brought the ark into the tabernacle
and set up the veil of the screen
and screened the ark of the testimony
as the Lord had commanded Moses.
